text: The Reformed Political Party, Dutch: Staatkundig Gereformeerde Partij (shortened SGP), is a Dutch political party. The Reformed Political Party is an orthodox Calvinist party. They are a very conservative party. It was established in 1918. Number of seats in the 2023 elections: 3 (0). == Political leaders == * Gerrit Hendrik Kersten - 1918-1945 * Pieter Zandt - 1945-1961 * Cor van Dis Sr. - 1961-1971 * Hette Abma - 1971-1981 * Henk van Rossum - 1981-1986 * Bas van der Vlies - 1986-2010 * Kees van der Staaij - 2010-2023 * Chris Stoffer - 2023- == Other websites == * Website of the Reformed Political Party Category:Calvinism Category:Political parties in the Netherlands Category:Protestantism in the Netherlands Category:1910s establishments in the Netherlands Category:1918 establishments in Europe
title: Reformed Political Party
